text: Atûn, ei lâibungpa Apollos chungroi chu, iempu dangngei leh munkhatin nangni hongpan rangin ko mohôk tita, hannirese ama hih ma vêl hin chu hong rangin la minnuom phar16:12: ama hih la minnuom phar nimaka; aninônchu Mahi anrêngin Pathien lungdo ni let mak. nimaka. Nikhomrese zorânchum a man tika hong atih.
